name: Rechroma Resource Format
summary: Learn about .RRF files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Rechroma is a video game in which a good witch removes the world's colors. It is available for Linux. The game contains an RRF file that it uses to load game levels. This file is stored in the game's Rechroma-master directory.

instructions: RRF files are not meant to be opened. Moving or modifying a Rechroma RRF file may cause the game to function incorrectly.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
